column5: Well, I don't have a dog, but I have a wife.   I tried it and got punched.  So much for that experiment.
Then my efforts have not been in vain!!! and I bet you anything, you are gonna try it on your dog if you have one, or on someone elses. It doesnt work on cats though. It just gets them pissed
Cripes NO..i should have mention that !!! Same reaction as cats. Dang....sorry man
Ah......damn, I better just leave this one alone....  :rofl2:

you realy shouldnt do that.  infections suck for the dog and your wallet .and yes they have a instinctive desire to keep themselves clean as well as other companions of theirs.   has your dog ever licked a cut or infection on you hand?    (ya im a dog guy)  ps. dogs will use their paws to scratch thier ears and lick thier paws (ticks or infection)   i could go on but it would bour every body.
i think you might have something here merc.  perhaps you should alert the media!
Ya Right . Thats NOT the Billy Bob we know ! Been waiting all day to read your reply. Stop biting your lip and say it.
i did that and the girl at the reception said all of the reporters had just left for vacation . Talk about coincidence eh !
Hell no !!! This is facinating stuff !!! Mine absolutely love it !!! I mean ya have to use yer head and dont shove yer finger right in to the knuckle dude !!Sheesh.
hey no offence intended . just love my dogs!  ok! ???
You read the post !! Do i sound like a guy who takes offense  None at all taken my friend.
The expression "digging your own grave" pops to mind.

Ya gotta admit though, its britened up the place a bit.And its not caused any ear infections either. And now....back to your regularly scheduled programing. I will let this fade into the archives.Thanks to all for tolerating this silly little thread
LOL!!!!!!!!!!!! It's been a LOOOONG winter.

You're right but I don't want to be banned.....  :rofl2:  Then where would I go for my winternet entertainment...  Today is MARCH 1st everyone.......They don't call it March Madness for nothing (not referring to basketball).
I am truly, utterly, completely and totaly speechless.
I Know !!!! I've been noticing some more strange an intrigueing canine behaviour. I just have to corellate my findings before presentation

LOL I love how some guys actually think the dudes serious Merc's obviously a smart   and just trying to joke around .Fuuny post Merc a little weird even for OFC but funny none the less.BTW you need to go
I am pretty sure he was waiting for someone to say. "Hey it works!!".  Then the joke would be on them, but no one bit.  It is either that or, well, I don't know. Lol.
Hmmmm...I wouldn't be so sure. Anyone want to place a wager that he was serious?
I try to give the benifit of doubt even when its a guy from Quebec LOL
No doubt in my mind he was serious. Also dumbest post I've ever seen and hopefully will ever see!

Sitting here the other day, drinking a coffee, and petting my Lab. I scratched her ear,inside, and when i took out my finger she sniffed and licked it. Did it again.....same thing. I then tried it on my Pom....Same thing. Next i went next door and tried it on my neighbors bichon maltais....same thing My neighbors looks at me weird now. Oh well....  Whats up with that !!! Could it be, that because they have no fingers, this is the only way they can know whats going on in there Its just about the only part of their body they cant reach....  Any Ideas why  I know some of you will try this,at least i hope so. Try it, they always do the same thing...every time too.
odd topic.  At least you didn't call it "where I stick my fingers"
I knew there was something strange about you, and you just put your finger on it.
I notice you've got winternet real bad
Wow, that's it, just Wow
Winternet case at it's worse
I am in tears over here.
LOL... or we need a version of google mail goggles on here....
I know it is early in 2011, but Mercman this post is going to win an award for most random topic of the year.  Well done Buddy.
This is by far the weirdest post I've ever seen.
Heyyyyyyy!!!!!!!!!! Are you guys makin fun of me!!!!!!  Try it !! Youll see !!! They lick yer finger every time.
Stop talking,please stop talking
Whats next Mercman? If you turn that dog around and try that test again, WE DONT want to know about it !  You sick puppy .
Nope doesnt work. They can inspect that themselves Only place they cant reach...or so it seems. I find it intrigueing......Not sure why though
Wash your hands, we're having popcorn.
Gotta start wearing my glasses in here. I was something other than popcorn.
If I were you I wouldn't be bumping this thread to the top.
Isn't there a Law against playing with an animal's Body Parts   Very disturbing to say the least
Stop doing that right now. You trying to give your dog a ear infection.
You post too much and (probably drink too much), that is what i noticed.
Actually, my little buddy, I quit 23 years ago. Shoulda seen me then....I was a real basket case
Okay, my apologies on the drinking part. For whatever reason i don't imbibe, but have full respect for friends of Bill W. My bad
No offense takin my friend
amazing. simply amazing. i definatly feel smarter after reading that info.
